title: EnO dayavillai
sahitya:
EnO dayavillai emperumAnE vAnE sukha vAnE


anupallavi

  gAnAnjali sheidun jnAnAnandam vENDinEn
kalikAlattil en japam paliyAdO vazhi yAdO


caraNam    pArAlayattilE pUrAyamAgavE bhattiyAi nambuvOr pittarin kumbalO
vArAyenum toNDar mun dArALamAga vandE varam tarum kAlamum malaiyEri maraindadO
